a.n: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! I (8)

p.k:
The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another.
Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy (2020)...
